text: -paqnamE#daqgniH sarvA# dEqvatAq viShNu#ryaqj~jO$&gniM caiqva viShNu#M caq svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq tAvEqvAsmai# yaqj~jaM praya#cCataq upai#naM ~Myaqj~jO na#matyAgnA- vaiShNaqvaM GRuqtE caqruM nirva#pEqccakShu#ShkAmOq&gnErvai cakShu#ShA manuqShyA# vi pa#Syanti yaqj~jasya# dEqvA aqgniM caiqva viShNu#M caq svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq tAvEqvA - [  ]  48
